title: ‘It’s a Bummer’: Chloe Dygert Reacts to Close Second Place In Tour de France Femmes Time Trial
content:
Dygert grateful to be making Tour debut after setbacks; Canyon-Sram leader Niewiadoma reacts to 30-second time loss and is ready for fight in Wednesday's 'insane' Ardennes finale.

Read the full article at ‘It’s a Bummer’: Chloe Dygert Reacts to Close Second Place In Tour de France Femmes Time Trial on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
